phrases: You plotted to kill my son.
Today, I will have you die by my Soul Slayer!
Why do I feel so flustered tonight?
Why would you know the crown prince?
I do not know any crown prince.
I just want to find Ye Hua.
Who are you to speak the crown prince's given name?
I did not tell you to rise.
Do you know what this place is?
How dare you act atrociously in the Celestial Palace?
Even if it is Ye Hua, he would not have the courage to save you.
Throw this mortal into the Evil Sealing Pagoda.
Ye Hua and I bowed to heaven and earth.
I am carrying his child in my womb.
Can you bring me to see him?
She really is carrying Ye Hua's child in her womb.
Your Highness, you know very well
in the Celestial Palace, aside from Medicine King
I am the only one who can read a pulse most accurately.
She really is carrying Ye Hua's child.
It is still not known whether Ye Hua is dead or alive.
She and Ye Hua have violated heaven's law.
You want me to spare her.
Would not that be telling me to bend the law?
She truly is carrying Ye Hua's child.
Or, why do not you punish her after she gives birth to the child?
Or, I am willing to carry the punishment in her place.
I did not teach my son well.
I am willing to suffer the punishment for this mortal.
Take this mortal to the unoccupied Zhaohua Palace
and place a strict watch on her.
I want to be with Ye Hua!
I want to be with him!
His Highness has survived this trial.
I have to speak with Crown Prince.
Three days ago, after you were slashed by the Mermaid Clan's Soul Slayer
your wife in the mortal realm dashed through your barrier.
She rushed through your barrier and was found by Father.
If you want to save her, then you better stay alive.
If you lose your life, death will come to her shortly after!
She is alive, she is still alive.
You do not have to worry about her safety.
The Mermaid Clan has been entirely annihilated.
Stay here a few days to recuperate
and then we will return to the Celestial Palace.
Do not you want to see her sooner?
From the moment Heavenly Lord found out...
it was no longer possible to be with her.
Now the only way to save her life
is to make Heavenly Lord think
that she holds no importance to me.
On the first day of the war, he was slashed by Mermaid Clan's Soul Slayer
Third Prince was afraid news of this would affect the war
so he had the news suppressed.
According to Medicine King's diagnosis, Crown Prince has barely saved his spirit.
You have been following by Crown Prince's side.
How could you let him take such a risk and nearly lose his life?
you will go to Lord Pu Hua for punishment.
Lord of Numinous Treasure' assembly invitations have been sent out.
Everyone will be coming to the Celestial Palace.
I can only go to Chang Sea a few days later.
Have Third Prince take good care of him.
I am afraid even if the sky falls down, His Majesty will not be coming here.
Your Highness, Celestial Tribe's Crown Prince
nearly lost his life to the Mermaid Clan at Chang Sea.
Regardless, Mermaid Clan is a part of the Ghost Tribe.
Ghost Tribe will be in deadly danger again.
Back when Qing Cang was sealed away, Ghost Tribe was not in deadly danger.
We will not be now either.
How dare you speak Ghost Lord's given name directly?
Could it be that even after 70,000 years has passed
you still only have regard for Qing Cang and not His Majesty?
Who is the true master of Grand Ziming Palace?
I cannot be bothered with you.
Your Highness, this is an invitation sent from the Celestial Palace.
Lord of Numinous Treasures of the Realm of Supreme Purity
This is the invitation for His Majesty.
You could have just sent someone.
You did not have to come to the mortal realm yourself.
Ever since the Mermaid Clan was annihilated
the palace has been in turmoil.
The old subjects are afraid the Celestial Tribe will think
the Mermaid Clan is a part of the Ghost Tribe
and direct their anger at us.
They cannot find you, so they pester me all day long.
but to use the invitation to come ask you
when you will be returning to the Ghost Realm.
I will go directly to the Celestial Palace.
You are going to the assembly?
When have I ever known how to speak about scriptures?
And how would I know how to discuss Daoism?
I am only going to offer a humble apology and make amends to the Celestial Tribe.
No matter what reason you had
taking my military seal was a huge offense.
Seeing as you and I are husband and wife
Return to the palace to reflect on the past.
You cannot treat me in this way.
I am... carrying your child in my womb.
Do not you want a child?
Your Majesty will be a father.
I have been hoping for this day for 70,000 years.
I will return to the palace with you.
You are but my father's consort.
How dare you trespass into the heir apparent's chambers?
I want to see Ye Hua.
I am begging you, Ye Hua.
Crown Prince kept a woman in the mortal realm?
This matter must not be made known.
But he already has an engagement with my aunt.
Why did he have to seek other women?
Your Highness, even the mortal realm's emperor
has a harem of countless women
let alone the next Heavenly Lord.
Even if Crown Prince does not seek them himself
he will still have many consorts later
to continue bearing a line of heirs for the Celestial Tribe.
Qing Qiu has always been one man and one wife.
No, I have to find out.
I am Bai Feng Jiu of Qing Qiu.
Are you the woman that Ye Hua had in the mortal realm?
Who does not know of him in the Nine Heavens?
I still have things to ask you.
Heavenly Lord will not allow us to speak to the mortal
and will not allow us to speak of this matter.
While Crown Prince is not around, could he be thinking of-
Have you forgotten the incident of the Water King of North Sea?
Clearly, I should be feeling furious on Aunt's behalf.
Why do I still feel a little sad?
This mortal is actually quite pitiful.
I want to see Ye Hua.
Your Majesty, are you really going to the Celestial Palace?
The Mermaid Clan was a part of the Ghost Tribe.
Although they separated from us for 70,000 years
they had severely injured the Crown Prince this time.
It is difficult for me to escape blame.
I can make use of Lord of Numinous Treasure's assembly
to go to the Celestial Palace to apologize
to prevent the Ghost Tribe from being further implicated.
Your Majesty is doing so for the sake of the Ghost Tribe.
But, these three days were the happiest I have been in these 70,000 years.
I cannot bear for you to leave.
Take good care of your health.
Shaman, how come she is feeling so unwell so early in the pregnancy?
The child in her womb is of Ghost Tribe.
There will be times when their essences conflict.
I think with more bed rest
she will naturally feel better as the months go by.
I will have the Shaman stay to keep you company.
You have not been to the Celestial Palace ever since you took the throne.
Since you are going to an assembly
then as Ghost Queen, I must stay by your side.
You are carrying a child of the Ghost Tribe.
It already disagrees with your immortal essence.
If you go to the Celestial Palace, will not you feel even more unwell?
When women in the mortal realm are pregnant
there will be times when they feel unwell.
How would I be so delicate?
In the 49 days of the assembly, Ghost Lord shall stay here.
If you have any requests, please let me know.
where the winter lotus sent from the Ghost Realm 70,000 years ago
It is in the lotus pond next to the Zhaohua Palace.
a bit unwell, so I will not be going with you.
Did not you say you would surely save this child for me?
Why does my stomach constantly hurt?
you have been living in the Ghost Realm for too long as an immortal
and your body has many injuries, so it is not fit...
Then what am I carrying now?
The young prince no longer has any signs of being alive.
I think Your Highness should return to the Ghost Realm.
I will give you a medicine, and have the young prince...
Your Highness, now that it has come to this
your own health is more important.
In these 70,000 years, His Majesty has never treated me with such patience.
You are not allowed to tell anybody.
Otherwise, I will take your life.
I will definitely keep my mouth shut.
Where is that peach blossom fragrance coming from?
It has been many millennia since I last saw you.
Seeing your back just now, I was not certain it was you.
I remember the first time I met you was at Kunlun Mountain.
Just now, I heard the palace maids say
How come you would be in the mood to admire this lotus?
I came to see the winter lotus.
I am afraid it had been in the Ghost Realm for too long
and is not used to the Celestial Realm's lotus pond.
I did not expect you to be such an attentive person.
You would be so concerned about a lotus.
Quickly find someone to put out the fire.
How come there is a fire?
It is my mount who has caused this trouble.
You need not blame yourself too much.
- Is this lady hurt? - I am not certain.
I am taking her back to Realm of Supreme Purity
and have my shaman take a look.
Your Majesty, it must be a Celestial transformed.
They know Your Majesty had a relationship to Si Yin
and must have transformed someone into Si Yin's image to deceive you.
- Your Majesty. - Quick, treat her injuries.
She was hurt by crimson hellfire.
but being injured by crimson hellfire can be very troublesome.
She is just a mortal woman.
There is no sign of immortal essence.
I actually failed to tell the difference between immortal and mortal.
Rather than say her face looks like Si Yin
I would say she looks more like Bai Qian.
Your Majesty, I have done wrong.
Do you know this is not Ghost Realm's Grand Ziming Palace?
Why did you use crimson hellfire in the Celestial Palace?
I passed by that abandoned palace
and felt that fragrance was so familiar, so I followed the scent
and saw this woman locked in the chambers and she was crying.
So I wanted to help her out.
But the lock on the door was millennium cold iron
and my powers could not break it.
So you used fire to burn it off?
Did not Your Majesty say crimson hellfire can exterminate all living things?
It can exterminate all living things.
That is why you are unable to control the intensity of the fire.
You wanted to burn the lock
so naturally, the chamber would burn as well.
I just hope Heavenly Lord will not pursue this incident.
I am Ghost Lord Li Jing.
Just now, it was my mount who accidentally set the fire.
So it was a fire set by you.
I thought they wanted to take my life.
Sister, the peach blossom scent on you smells so nice.
Why would a mortal be living in the Celestial Palace?
Who are you to the Crown Prince?
I am Crown Prince Ye Hua's mother, Consort Le Xu.
No need to stand on ceremony, Ghost Lord.
I heard you saved someone of mine.
I came to express my thanks
This lady belongs to your palace?
This lady violated some of heaven's law.
I had her locked in Zhaohua Palace to reflect on her mistakes.
I did not expect a fire to break out and for her to be saved by you.
Your Majesty, that lady is with child.
Your Majesty, the Celestial Tribe has always taken their laws seriously.
For them to keep a mortal in custody, and one that is pregnant
this matter must not be simple.
I came on this trip to the Celestial Palace to apologize.
As for other people, there is nothing I can do.
